awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Jane Hudson, a jaunty as well as attractive middle-aged secretary from Akron, Ohio, has finally made it to Venice, Italy, for her long-awaited dream vacation. Never-married Jane is a self-described "independent type" who's content, or so she claims, to go it mostly alone, armed with her movie camera. Jane soon discovers that even in a city as beautiful and fascinating as Venice, going it alone can still leave one feeling terribly lonely. All that is about to change, starting with a brief encounter at an outdoor cafè in the Piazza San Marco, where Jane draws the attention of a handsome antiques-shop owner named Renato de Rossi.
plot: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.
title: Summertime
